dict.acceptation: 明亮的；<非正式>美好的；闪耀的；才华横溢的；

sent.orig: They have done a brilliant job, and General Petraeus has done a brilliant job.
sent.trans: 他们，还有佩崔斯将军，做出了一项辉煌的成就。

sent.orig: Reactive brilliant blue bismuth dyestuff is synthesized by using reactive brilliant blue and bismuth nitrate.
sent.trans: 本文以活性艳蓝和硝酸铋为原料，合成了活性艳蓝铋染料。

sent.orig: Did you think the book matched up to its brilliant review?
sent.trans: 你是否认为这本书与其充满赞誉的书评相符？

sent.orig: Rather than white and black bands, the film shows a succession of brilliant colors.
sent.trans: 膜上显出艳丽的色彩，而不是白色和黑色的条纹。

sent.orig: His brilliant novel turned a flash in the pan; he never wrote another one.
sent.trans: 他的这篇极为出色的小说竟是昙花一现，再没有能写出第二篇来。
